Trade/Device Name(s): ROMA Calculation Tool Using Elecsys Assays
Regulation Name(s): Ovarian adnexal mass assessment score test system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ROMA Calculation Tool Using Elecsys Assays, a qualitative test combining Elecsys HE4, CA 125 II assays, and menopausal status to assess malignancy risk in women with ovarian adnexal mass.
Indications for Use Summary: Aids in assessing whether pre- or postmenopausal women over age 18, presenting with an ovarian adnexal mass and planned for surgery (not yet referred to oncology), are at high or low likelihood of malignancy, to be interpreted alongside independent clinical and radiological assessment.
